alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wyoming, northwestern Livingston and southeastern Genesee Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Batavia to 6 miles west of Avon. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batavia, Geneseo, Le Roy, Avon, Mount Morris, Attica, Pavilion, Caledonia, York, Stafford, Covington, Elba, Alexander, Leicester, Wyoming, East Bethany and Bethany Center. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
